Q. Why should I use iitguide.com services? 
 
A. We ask you a question to answer this question: 
 
Do you think an additional session on weekdays evenings from the reputed professors can add to your knowledge and increase the chance of success? Do you think online test series can increase your chances in JEE? Do you think accessing classes, video recordings and assignment anywhere, including your smart phone will enable you to get the best material anywhere? If your answers is yes, then you should use iitguide.com services. 
 
Q. Can I register to classes on this website even if I am taking coaching at other places? 
 
A. Sure you can, our classes will add more knowledge. 
 
Q. How techniques are different than conventional coaching?

A. With 30+ years of teaching experience for IIT preparation, our faculty members believe that by learning techniques for tests you can perform better. Conventional coaching teaches the subject while we teach the tricks to solve the provlem and crack the exam.
